thread.title: ジジ・ハディッドら、ミッソーニのミラノコレクションで反トランプ帽子「ファッション業界は恐れない」
thread.title_full: ジジ・ハディッドら、ミッソーニのミラノコレクションで反トランプ帽子「ファッション業界は恐れない」

author: 泉谷由梨子
title: ジジ・ハディッドら、ミッソーニのミラノコレクションで反トランプ帽子「ファッション業界は恐れない」
text:   NEW YORK, NY - SEPTEMBER 14: Gigi Hadid walks the runway at Anna Sui Ready to Wear Spring Summer 2017 fashion show during New York Fashion Week on September 14, 2016 in New York City. (Photo by Victor VIRGILE/Gamma-Rapho via Getty Images) NEW YORK, NY - SEPTEMBER 14: Gigi Hadid walks the runway during the Anna Sui September 2016 New York Fashion Week: The Shows Spring 2017 season at The Arc, Skylight at Moynihan Station on September 14, 2016 in New York City. (Photo by Randy Brooke/WireImage) NEW YORK, NY - SEPTEMBER 14: Gigi Hadid walks the runway during the Anna Sui September 2016 New York Fashion Week: The Shows Spring 2017 season at The Arc, Skylight at Moynihan Station on September 14, 2016 in New York City. (Photo by Randy Brooke/WireImage) NEW YORK, NY - SEPTEMBER 15: Model Gigi Hadid walks the runway at the Marc Jacobs fashion show during New York Fashion Week at Hammerstein Ballroom on September 15, 2016 in New York City. (Photo by Peter White/Getty Images) MILAN, ITALY - SEPTEMBER 22: Gigi Hadid walks the runway at the Max Mara show during Milan Fashion Week Spring/Summer 2017 on September 22, 2016 in Milan, Italy. (Photo by Antonio de Moraes Barros Filho/WireImage) MILAN, ITALY - SEPTEMBER 22: Gigi Hadid walks the runway at the Fendi show during Milan Fashion Week Spring/Summer 2017 on September 22, 2016 in Milan, Italy. (Photo by Antonio de Moraes Barros Filho/WireImage) Model Gigi Hadid presents a creation for fashion house Fendi during the 2017 Women's Spring / Summer collections shows at Milan Fashion Week on September 22, 2016 in Milan. / AFP / GIUSEPPE CACACE (Photo credit should read GIUSEPPE CACACE/AFP/Getty Images) MILAN, ITALY - SEPTEMBER 22: Gigi Hadid walks the runway at the Moschino show during Milan Fashion Week Spring/Summer 2017 on September 22, 2016 in Milan, Italy. (Photo by Antonio de Moraes Barros Filho/WireImage) MILAN, ITALY - SEPTEMBER 22: Gigi Hadid walks the runway at the Fendi Ready to Wear designed by Silvia Venturini Fendi & Karl Lagerfeld show Milan Fashion Week Spring/Summer 2017 on September 22, 2016 in Milan, Italy. (Photo by Victor VIRGILE/Gamma-Rapho via Getty Images) MILAN, ITALY - SEPTEMBER 22: Gigi Hadid walks the runway at the Fendi Ready to Wear designed by Silvia Venturini Fendi & Karl Lagerfeld show Milan Fashion Week Spring/Summer 2017 on September 22, 2016 in Milan, Italy. (Photo by Victor VIRGILE/Gamma-Rapho via Getty Images) MILAN, ITALY - SEPTEMBER 22: Gigi Hadid walks the runway at the Max Mara Ready to Wear show during the Milan Fashion Week Spring/Summer 2017 on September 22, 2016 in Milan, Italy. (Photo by Victor VIRGILE/Gamma-Rapho via Getty Images) MILAN, ITALY - SEPTEMBER 22: Gigi Hadid walks the runway at the Max Mara Ready to Wear show during the Milan Fashion Week Spring/Summer 2017 on September 22, 2016 in Milan, Italy. (Photo by Victor VIRGILE/Gamma-Rapho via Getty Images) MILAN, ITALY - SEPTEMBER 22: Gigi Hadid walks the runway at the Moschino Ready to Wear show during Milan Fashion Week Spring/Summer 2017 on September 22, 2016 in Milan, Italy. (Photo by Victor VIRGILE/Gamma-Rapho via Getty Images) MILAN, ITALY - SEPTEMBER 22: Gigi Hadid walks the runway at the Moschino Ready to Wear show during Milan Fashion Week Spring/Summer 2017 on September 22, 2016 in Milan, Italy. (Photo by Victor VIRGILE/Gamma-Rapho via Getty Images) PARIS, FRANCE - SEPTEMBER 29: Supermodel Gigi Hadid walks the runway at the Balmain Spring Summer 2017 fashion show during Paris Fashion Week on September 29, 2016 in Paris, France. (Photo by Catwalking/Getty Images) US model Gigi Hadid presents a creation for Balmain during the 2017 Spring/Summer ready-to-wear collection fashion show, on September 29, 2016 in Paris. / AFP / BERTRAND GUAY (Photo credit should read BERTRAND GUAY/AFP/Getty Images) PARIS, FRANCE - SEPTEMBER 29: Model Gigi Hadid walks the runway during the Balmain show as part of the Paris Fashion Week Womenswear Spring/Summer 2017 on September 29, 2016 in Paris, France. (Photo by Peter White/Getty Images) PARIS, FRANCE - SEPTEMBER 29: Model Gigi Hadid walks the runway during the Balmain designed by Olivier Rousteing show as part of the Paris Fashion Week Womenswear Spring/Summer 2017 on September 29, 2016 in Paris, France. (Photo by Estrop/Getty Images) PARIS, FRANCE - SEPTEMBER 29: Gigi Hadid walks the runway during the Isabel Marant show as part of the Paris Fashion Week Womenswear Spring/Summer 2017 at Palais Royal on September 29, 2016 in Paris, France. (Photo by Richard Bord/Getty Images) US model Gigi Hadid presents a creation for Elie Saab during the 2017 Spring/Summer ready-to-wear collection fashion show, on October 1, 2016 in Paris. / AFP / ALAIN JOCARD (Photo credit should read ALAIN JOCARD/AFP/Getty Images) PARIS, FRANCE - OCTOBER 01: Gigi Hadid walks the runway during the Elie Saab show as part of the Paris Fashion Week Womenswear Spring/Summer 2017 on October 1, 2016 in Paris, France. (Photo by Victor VIRGILE/Gamma-Rapho via Getty Images) PARIS, FRANCE - OCTOBER 03: Gigi Hadid walks the runway during the Gambattista Valli Ready to Wear fashion show as part of the Paris Fashion Week Womenswear Spring/Summer 2017 on October 3, 2016 in Paris, France. (Photo by Victor VIRGILE/Gamma-Rapho via Getty Images) PARIS, FRANCE - OCTOBER 03: Gigi Hadid walks the runway during the Gambattista Valli show as part of the Paris Fashion Week Womenswear Spring/Summer 2017 on October 3, 2016 in Paris, France. (Photo by Antonio de Moraes Barros Filho/WireImage) PARIS, FRANCE - OCTOBER 03: Gigi Hadid walks the runway during the Gambattista Valli show as part of the Paris Fashion Week Womenswear Spring/Summer 2017 on October 3, 2016 in Paris, France. (Photo by Thierry Orban/Getty Images) PARIS, FRANCE - OCTOBER 03: Gigi Hadid walks the runway during the Gambattista Valli show as part of the Paris Fashion Week Womenswear Spring/Summer 2017 on October 3, 2016 in Paris, France. (Photo by Thierry Orban/Getty Images) PARIS, FRANCE - OCTOBER 03: Supermodel Gigi Hadid walks the runway at the Giambattista Valli Spring Summer 2017 fashion show during Paris Fashion Week on October 3, 2016 in Paris, France. (Photo by Catwalking/Getty Images) PARIS, FRANCE - OCTOBER 03: Gigi Hadid walks the runway during the Gambattista Valli Ready to Wear fashion show as part of the Paris Fashion Week Womenswear Spring/Summer 2017 on October 3, 2016 in Paris, France. (Photo by Victor VIRGILE/Gamma-Rapho via Getty Images) PARIS, FRANCE - OCTOBER 03: Gigi Hadid walks the runway during the Gambattista Valli Ready to Wear fashion show as part of the Paris Fashion Week Womenswear Spring/Summer 2017 on October 3, 2016 in Paris, France. (Photo by Victor VIRGILE/Gamma-Rapho via Getty Images) PARIS, FRANCE - OCTOBER 03: Gigi Hadid walks the runway during the Gambattista Valli Ready to Wear fashion show as part of the Paris Fashion Week Womenswear Spring/Summer 2017 on October 3, 2016 in Paris, France. (Photo by Victor VIRGILE/Gamma-Rapho via Getty Images) PARIS, FRANCE - OCTOBER 05: Gigi Hadid walks the runway during the Miu Miu Ready to Wear fashion show as part of the Paris Fashion Week Womenswear Spring/Summer 2017 on October 5, 2016 in Paris, France.
